description: The image presents a stark anachronism: a caveman, dressed in a loincloth and holding a wrapped gift, stands at the entrance to a formal modern dining room. Inside, a woman in contemporary clothing prepares for a dinner party, complete with a set table, glasses, and a lit candle. The absurdity lies in this direct clash of prehistoric existence with modern social etiquette, specifically the act of bringing a hostess gift to a formal gathering. This juxtaposition creates humor by placing a figure from "Early Man" into a scene of modern domesticity.
caption: Early Man
